## hpr2514 :: Electronics Calculator Kit

 
NYbill talks about building a $16 electronics calculator kit.


Kkmoon DIY Calculator Kit: https://tinyurl.com/yc9z92pc


Pics for the episode: https://media.gunmonkeynet.net/u/nybill/collection/electronics-calculator-kit/

Just to save anyone from searching for some secret mode on their
calculators, I misspoke. I mention using my TI calculator in “Degree Mode”.
I meant to say “Normal Mode”. It just happens to say DEG on the screen in tiny
letters. What can I say, I’m easily distra
Oh look at that!
